Introduction
============

The Data Processing Library provides tools for automating common data analysis tasks. This library 
simplifies data preprocessing, exploratory analysis, and basic model testing through automated functions.

Key Features
-----------

* Automated data preprocessing
* Missing value analysis and handling
* Outlier detection
* Basic statistical analysis
* Model testing capabilities

Benefits
--------

* Reduces time and effort by automating repetitive tasks
* Ensures data quality through standardized processes
* Supports users of different skill levels
* Standardizes workflows in collaborative projects
